section.title: Coping with rape-kisses
section.simpara: If a woman “rape-kiss”es me, I will not resist and even try to enjoy it. Do note that it will still feel awkward, so please don’t do this.

section.title: Meeting invitations
section.simpara: Given there are many women (and likely many men) whom my mismanagement as a Terran terminator caused heartbreak, sadness, and grief, I will accept meeting invitations from any woman who isn’t overly fat and unkempt. Before it, she and I will donate some money to a charity of her choice, and tweet about it, while possibly hyperlinking to her website. At the end of the meeting, we may both hug upon mutual agreement.

section.title: Sharing our sex lives
section.simpara: Given I enjoy hacky acting, I may need to kiss fellow actresses on stage.

I don’t own 100% of your sex-life either. E.g.: as of 2023-05-16 , my current celebrity crush is Tiffany Alvord, and I feature her in my screenplays as kissing 3 actors, 2 muppets, and 1 animated draconequus. I hope that she complies, when-and-if the screenplays are produced.
As far as I am concerned, my significant other can 4th-base four, female, underage, kangaroos.

section.title: Favourite pastimes
section.simpara: Nevertheless, I still have the need for an intimate, Romantic, relationship. With a woman. I cannot guarantee I’ll love you forever, but I’ll try hard not to take you for granted, and let me know when and if I do.
One of my favourite pastimes is crossover philosophy/comedy (including stand-up one, or one done on online chats, or forums). Other pasttimes I enjoy include:

listitem.simpara: Checkers, backgammon and other board games but not chess
Tabletop role-playing games (TTRPG), e.g: Dungeons & Dragons, Star Wars Role-playing-game
Playing the Role Playing Game of Greater Fantasia
There are other types of conventions, parties, or assemblies I enjoy, as long as I will be able to quickly teleport back home.
Solving mathematical, logical, or Competitive Programming riddles and puzzles
I like weight-training (e.g: at gyms). I also liked some introductory Yoga sessions I attended.

section.title: Modelling
section.simpara: I might pose naked or scantily clad, if I’m offered enough money and/or it’s a noble enough cause, and it isn’t too time-consuming. You can also try hiring a temporary lookalike of mine or peruse the Akashic records. I am also open for modelling captioned T-shirts, and shorts.

section.title: Physical freedom
section.simpara: If you tie me to bed, or lock me inside/outside, I might break up with you, and get a restraining order.

section.title: Alimony
section.simpara: If we divorce, you can have half my cash (or more?). I’ll likely make it back. Furthermore, I swear I will not require alimony from you.

section.title: Family names
section.simpara: Let’s suppose, without loss of generality, that your premarital name is “Jane Austen”.

listitem.simpara: I will remain Mr. Shlomi Fish.
We can call the children “Austen”, but hopefully not “Austen-Fish”
I suggest your name will remain “Jane Austen”, but you can opt to change it to “Jane Austen-Fish”, or “Jane Fish”, or whatever.
